titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Edward Bevan, [1950/1951]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Aus einer Kopie in 'The Ray Monk Archive, The Random House Group Archive & Library, Rushden', Signatur: ‘Monk Ray, Wittgenstein Archive, Box 14’.
Abschrift und Kommentar Gabriel Citron, Scan in BA,

div.p:
If you have these records already, or if you don’t like them, they can be exchanged at Miller’s. If you have this symphony but not this recording play the second movement & the third & the fourth & maybe you’ll like this recording better than the one you have (if any). I think the performance
is pretty good though not perfect.
I’ve only come here for a couple of days to see Ben after his exam. You know the result & what I feel about it. Thanks for your great kindness!
